card.name: Shatterglade Patriarch
card.text:

card.text:

"It has been clearly declared. Being in the blast radius is your own fault."

card.name: MAX POWER
card.text:
Set a unit's strength to 11.
"We crossed a line somewhere. But let's see what happens if we keep going."

card.name: Surge Capacitor
card.text:
Exert and pay 2Q: Your units gain +1/0.
"The juice must flow."

card.name: Reactor
card.text:
Your cards cost 1Q less. If destroyed, take 10 damage.
All the incomprehensible power they generate, to an observer manifests as a simple, steady hum.

card.name: Ayna, Spirit Seeker
card.text:
When a friendly unit dies, put a counter on this Quanta Lord. Remove 3 counters from any friendly card: Deal 1 damage or heal 1 life.
The living no longer remember the world. How it used to be. Only the immortal spirits still know their names. The destroyer. The titan. The pyre. The horror. The king.

card.name: Dune Mystic
card.text:
Exert: Deal 1 damage or draw a card.
"Outside the enclaves, life goes on as it has for centuries - poorly but steadily."

card.name: Ancient Construct
card.text:
{Echo} This card gains +2/+2 or draw 2 cards.
"With its masters long gone, it travels the wastes in search of meaning."

card.name: Thaumaturgical Multicutter
card.text:
Gains +2/0 when a support is cast. After attacking, set strength to its base value.
Magic has kept these blades as sharp as the day they were enchanted.

card.name: Hedge Seer
card.text:
Draw 1 more card during your draw phase. Shuffle 1 of them into your deck.
"The future is... unclear. Try asking again later."

card.name: Power Broker
card.text:
{Summon} If an opponent has more cards than you, put a random card from their hand into yours.
"I think you're holding out on me, friend."

card.name: Ancient Lich
card.text:
{Summon} Destroy an enemy Unit with 4 toughness or less.
The old get older. The strong get stronger.

card.name: Spellsteed Rider
card.text:
[Swift] Whenever you cast a support, you can summon this card from or send it back to your hand.
"Spellslinging from horseback. Why did nobody think of this before?"

card.name: Primordial Shape
card.text:
Once a turn, discard a card: Summon a 3/3 Elemental token and give it [Guard], [Hidden] or [Drain].
"What is the shape of a shape?"

card.name: Auchidem, the Thrice Sealed
card.type: Mythical Arcane Unit — Undead Mage Ascendant
card.text:
[Aura] Exert: Deal 5 damage to all other units or give them +2/+2. Purge this card.
"The power is imprisoned within me - I am shackled to this land - And this world too, has been locked into ineffable tides..."

card.name: Magic Dart
card.text:
Deal damage equal to your hand size to a unit.
"The original."

card.name: Mirage
card.text:
Shuffle an enemy unit into its controller's deck. They draw a card.
"It's been a hundred steps away my whole life."

card.name: Oasis
card.text:
All players draw 2 cards. All units gain 2 life.
"Spirits of the world yet persevere."

card.name: Invocation
card.text:
Deal 2 damage. Heal 2 life. Draw a card.
You can do anything. Just put your mind to it.

card.name: Spirit Away
card.text:
Shuffle a card that costs XQ into your deck.
A long journey can change people.

card.name: Astral Feedback
card.text:
Purge a unit. Deal 4 damage to it.
"When the angry iris of the sky opens, run."

card.name: Sandstorm
card.text:
Deal 3 damage to a unit. If it survives, return it to its controller's hand.
"You'd rather be anywhere else."

card.name: Flux
card.text:
Activate when an enemy casts a support. It costs 5Q more.
The weight falls upon the caster like a million suns. Only the foolish persist in their attempts.

card.name: Forbidden Flame
card.text:
Deal 5 damage. If you hold a Mythical card, you can reveal it: Deal 5 damage to everyone instead.
"Some things should have stayed forgotten."

card.name: Tempest
card.text:
For each card in your hand, summon a 3/3 Elemental token and give it [Swift]. Destroy them at the end of your turn.
"The land will never allow this to happen again."

card.name: Vessel of Coalescence
card.text:
Whenever you cast a support, add a counter. Remove 3 counters: Create a 3/3 Elemental.
"They come from swirling dust, or thin air. Seemingly out of nowhere."

card.name: Girimehkala, the Inheritor
card.text:
Pay 6Q: Put a counter on this Quanta Lord.When you summon a unit, give it +1/+1 for each counter on this Quanta Lord.
The fury never subsided. The grudge would carry on. The progeny of the titan took life and calamity followed.

card.name: Toothscale
card.text:
[Swift] {Attack} If this card would kill a unit in this battle, it does not die from this battle and heals all life.
"Looking for its daily feast."

card.name: Gnarled Witch
card.text:
When a friendly unit recovers life, deal 1 damage.
Grow tall. Or be trampled.

card.name: Shardspawn
card.text:
[Guard] When damaged, lose [Guard]: Give another friendly unit [Guard].
"The smallest pieces of the titan took a life of their own."

card.name: Leaf Roc
card.text:
{Summon} Give another friendly unit +2/0.
"The forest is watching."

card.name: Hulking Troll
card.text:
Exert: This card heals all life.
"There are stories of people cooking and eating troll meat only to burst from within."

card.name: Arcentree
card.text:
When a friendly unit deals 5 or more battle damage, draw a card.
"Those who sought to fell it now adorn it."

card.name: Thrashing Beast
card.text:
{Battle} Deal 1 damage to all enemy units, except the battling one.
Collateral is not a concept well known in the forests.

card.name: Arahabaki, the Titanbeast
card.text:
[Swift], [Pierce]
"When the shadow falls over you, you will know fear."

card.name: The Spore Titan
card.text:
[Guard] {Death} Fully heal all friendly units and give them [Shroud] until your next turn.
Too large to be predated, the spore giant is a rare power that can afford to be benign.

card.name: Bloodbond
card.text:
Your Quanta Lord loses 5 life. Gain 2Q.
"Nothing ever comes easy."

card.name: Mantra
card.text:
Heal a unit for 4. If this fully heals it, give it [Aura].
A healing technique, almost forgotten. Coaxed from the spirits, the price unknown.

card.name: Vanguard
card.text:
Give your Quanta Lord [Guard] and [Aura] until the start of your next turn.
"The strong guard the weak, so the weak may guard the strong."

card.name: Crunch
card.text:
Deal damage equal to a friendly unit's strength.
"Claws stronger than iron. Teeth stronger than steel."

card.name: Leech
card.text:
Your Quanta Lord steals up to 6 life from an enemy unit.
Swift and brutal, or slow and agonizing. Passage of life moves at many leagues.

card.name: Voracity
card.text:
Draw a card. Pay 2 life: Draw 1 more. Pay 4 life: Draw 1 more.
It's only natural to want more.

card.name: Fatality
card.text:
Destroy a damaged unit.
"A mercy, of sorts."

card.name: Wild Shape
card.text:
Double a unit's strength or toughness.
"Anything that survived the forests regressed into a more practical form."

card.name: Morning Dew
card.text:
Heal 10 life, split as you choose. All units healed gain 0/+1.
"Every dawn is its reward."

card.name: Star Power
card.text:
Give a unit +5/+5. It has [Shroud] until the start of your next turn.
"The power of the myriad, in the service of the power of one."

card.name: Idol of Carnage
card.text:
When a unit dies, put a counter on this card. Exert: Remove all counters from this card. Heal for an equal amount.
"Life feeds life."

card.name: Mephorash, the Reclaimer
card.text:
Exert: Transform a friendly unit into a Dire Spawn with +X/0. Exert: Increase X by 1.
"Back. We must go back. There is still time. Why can't you understand!?"

card.name: Impish Pillager
card.text:
{Attack} Mill 2 cards.
"I hope it was nothing important."

card.name: Revenant
card.text:
[Guard] If milled, resurrect this card.
The fettered return. It is their turn.

card.name: Stygian Tempter
card.text:
{Summon} Take control of an enemy unit with 2 or less strength.
"We're fighting to save you. From yourselves."

card.name: Shrouded Corruptor
card.text:
{Kill} Summon a 2/1 Spawn token for the killed unit's controller.
"If only you knew."

card.name: Dessicated
card.text:
{Summon} Steal 1 strength and toughness from all other units.
"The dead, ironically, preserved a lot better than the living."

card.name: Writhing Thing
card.text:
{Summon} Summon 3 2/1 Spawn tokens. {Death} Destroy all Spawns you control.
Tentacles. Why did it have to be tentacles.

card.name: Bloated Monstrosity
card.text:
Exert: Sacrifice this card. Deal damage equal to its missing life to all enemy units.
"Boomer!"

card.name: Ethereal Stalker
card.text:
{Echo} Resurrect this card.
"The danger is gone. But the fear stays."

card.name: Corrupt Incarnate
card.text:
{Summon} - Mill up to 7 cards. If their total cost is 7 or lower, add them to your hand.
"Many wishes. And it only takes one to regret them all."

card.name: Lost Signal
card.text:
{Death} Annihilate this card: Next turn, put this card into your hand. If killed by a unit, annihilate the killer.
"An eternity of screams, followed by a moment of silence."

card.name: Old Maxwell
card.text:
{Summon} All friendly units gain {Death} Create a 2/1 Spawn.
The name keeps appearing in records, but can never be attributed.

card.name: Mitosis
card.text:
Destroy a unit: Summon 2 3/2 Dire Spawn tokens for its controller.
"From one, many."

card.name: Scourge
card.text:
Annihilate a unit.
"It's as if it never were there."

card.name: From Beyond
card.text:
Annihilate any number of cards in your graveyard: Deal that much damage to a unit.
"The living will envy the dead."

card.name: Inner Demons
card.text:
Halve an enemy unit's strength and toughness, rounding down. Summon a Shadow token with stats equal to the amount reduced.
"In your weakest moments, it grows stronger."

card.name: Despair
card.text:
Give a unit -4/-4.
Kneel.

card.name: Eclipse
card.text:
Mill 3 cards: Summon a 2/1 Spawn token for each unit milled.
"Sacrifices must be made."

card.name: Dopple
card.text:
Swap the strength and toughness of 2 different units.
"What's yours is mine as they say."

card.name: Gestate
card.text:
Sacrifice a unit: Summon 2 Dire Spawns and give them [Swift].
The power was inside you all along.

card.name: Mass Lethargy
card.text:
Set the strength and toughness of all enemy units to 1.
"To remove the ability to fight, remove the will to fight."

card.name: Hungry Jelly
card.text:
Exert: Gain +2/+1.
"Mmmmm. Rich in iron. And only a hint of rust."

card.name: Untouchable
card.text:
[Shroud]
Life passes some by.

card.name: Clockstopper
card.text:
{Summon} Destroy a relic: Gain +2/+2.
We tend to destroy what we can't understand.

card.name: Pure Vessel
card.text:
{Flash} Purge this card.
"All change is entropy. All action is corruption."

card.name: Adept
card.text:
[Aura], [Guard]
Perfection is always just beyond the horizon.

card.name: Rolling Stone
card.text:
[Swift], [Pierce]
Out of the way, scrubs.

card.name: Shimmering Dragon
card.text:
{Defend} Mill a card: If it was a support, negate the attack.
"It never gets old."

card.name: Mana Gorgon
card.text:
[Guard] {Death} Set enemy Q to 0.
"Petrified quanta cannot be seen. It cannot be touched. But it can be felt."

card.name: Lightdrinker
card.text:
{Summon} Steal a unit's [Aura], [Guard] or [Swift].
"Ah... a sunny delight."

card.name: Dusklord Barrow, the Returned
card.text:
When another unit takes damage, destroy it.
"The long night has only just begun."

card.name: Shuregg, the Destroyer
card.text:
{Battle} Double this card's strength. {Upkeep} Set its strength to 4.
"Don't get him started."

card.name: Trip
card.text:
Activate when an opponent summons a unit. Purge it and set its strength and toughness to 1.
"The mighty champion has fallen. And he just can't get up."

card.name: Subsume
card.text:
Sacrifice a unit: Your Quanta Lord gains 8 life.
"The strings that give life are the strings that bind."

card.name: Bargain
card.text:
Swap a unit's strength and toughness.
"The scales tip."

card.name: Focus
card.text:
Give a unit [Swift].
"When you land, land on your feet."

card.name: Dominate
card.text:
Take control of an enemy unit.
Only the will of iron deserves true control.

card.name: Sanctify
card.text:
Purge a unit, then give it +4/+4.
"I am ready."

card.name: Heroic Strike
card.text:
This turn, your Quanta Lord gains 5 strength and can attack.
"Some matters require direct intervention."

card.name: Phantom Hammer
card.text:
Deal 4 damage to all enemy units. Annihilate all units this would kill instead.
"Not even dust remained."

card.name: Iron Chains
card.text:
{Summon} Target a unit. That unit cannot unexert.
"Any will can be measured by the girth of the chains that will bind it."

card.name: Integration Administrator
card.text:
{Flash} Exert and pay 3Q: Give a unit [Guard] or [Drain], then its type becomes Construct.
A herald of technology. They seek and claim. If you're lucky, they'll ask first.

card.name: Lord Bang
card.type: Mythical Neutral Unit — Human Anomaly Soldier
card.text:
{Summon} Deal damage equal to your units' combined strength bonuses.
This is it.

card.name: Devastroy
card.text:
Destroy a unit. Resurrect it. Destroy it (again).
Why are both heroes and heretics sent to the pyre? Is our ceremony an honor or punishment? - Learned Shazaim

card.name: Modus Alpha
card.text:
At the end of your turn, your units heal 1 life for each counter on this card. {Summon} Put a counter on this card. Exert and pay 4Q: Put a counter on this card.
Objective: Efficiency. Protocol: Maintenance.

card.name: Modus Gamma
card.text:
When an enemy unit dies: Give different friendly units any ability, except [Invulnerable], up to the number of counters on this card. {Summon} Put a counter on this card. Exert and pay 4Q: Put a counter on this card.
Objective: Cultivation. Protocol: Harvest.

card.name: Modus Sigma
card.text:
{Upkeep} Your units gain +2/0 and take 2 damage for each counter on this card. {Summon} Put a counter on this card. Exert and pay 4Q: Put a counter on this card.
Objective: Control. Protocol: Overload.

card.name: Modus Omega
card.text:
When a friendly unit attacks, deal 2 damage and take 1 damage for each counter on this card. {Summon} Put a counter on this card. Exert and pay 4Q: Put a counter on this card.
Objective/Protocol: Extermination.

card.name: Memory Bank
card.text:
Exert and pay 4Q: Annihilate a unit from your graveyard. Add its effect to a friendly unit.
Immortality might be a lost cause, but our knowledge will never die.

card.name: Emergency Maneuvers
card.text:
Place your destroyed unit into your hand instead of your graveyard.
Ejecting!

card.name: Athanasia Procedure
card.text:
When a friendly unit not named Husk dies, resurrect it, purge it, and its name becomes Husk. Destroy at the end of your next turn.
For those whose devotion goes beyond death, bury these seeds within your minds.

card.name: Shacklebond
card.text:
Target a unit. When that unit would deal damage this turn, deal it to all enemy units instead.
Imparted by kind visitors from another realm, this technique is feared by all greater beings.

card.name: Hopeless Horizon Soldier
card.text:
[Aura] {Upkeep} Give this card [Aura].
"The elders always say to just keep walking."

card.name: Hopeless Horizon Savant
card.text:
[Aura], [Aura] This card can have 2 instances of [Aura]. {Flash} Remove [Aura] from this card: Give it [Shroud] until the end of turn.
"The teacher always says to never look back."

card.name: The Time Being
card.text:
{Upkeep} Put a counter on this Quanta Lord. {Flash} Exert, target a unit, and remove counters from this Quanta Lord equal to that unit's Quanta cost: Annihilate that unit until the end of the turn.
Every moment in history was now, and every moment in the future will be now. And Now? He's here.

card.name: Clock Tower Warden
card.text:
When an enemy would take damage, you can exert: Place that many counters on this card instead. Exert: Remove X counters from this card and deal that much damage.
A single spire stands in the center of the crater.

card.name: Grey Crane
card.text:
[Guard] {Summon} Summon a 2/1 Salty the Hamster special token.
"Raise the curtains. We'll show them real magic!"

card.name: The Grieving Marauder
card.text:
[Guard] {Damaged} Annihilate a unit from your graveyard. This card has [Regenerate] while you have a unit in your graveyard.
A remorseful cheater. This time he's playing until he loses.

card.name: Cattle Provider
card.text:
Sacrifice another unit: Heal this card and your Quanta Lord life equal to that unit's Quanta cost, then give this card +1/+1.
Proud chef and butcher on a quest to serve man.

card.name: Fickle Fisher
card.text:
[Hidden] {Upkeep} 2 different random players choose a card in their respective hands and swap them.
In the right moment, with the right angle, anything is possible.

card.name: Umbral Monarch
card.text:
[Swift] {Flash} Exert: Give a friendly unit [Hidden] until your next upkeep.
A fair and just ruler with nothing to hide.

card.name: The Count
card.text:
{Summon} Transfer all counters from other cards to this card. This card has +1/+1 for each counter on it.
So, a vampire walks into a bar...

card.name: Chronological Key
card.text:
Pay 1Q: Note down the exact state of a unit (attach a clone of it to this card). {Flash} Exert: Pay 2Q to return the last noted unit to its noted state.
What does it open? Merely possibilities.

card.name: Reverse the Polarity
card.text:
Activate in response to an effect that targets. You choose the target(s).
Re-route the power to the flux capacitors! We're going where no man has gone before!

card.name: Gaze Through the Eclipse
card.text:
{Echo 2} Draw a card for each friendly Outsider unit.
When the veil parts, look through their eyes. -Kalangue Monument

card.name: One-Masked Man
card.text:
{Summon} If all units in your graveyard have the same name, give this card [Guard], [Drain], [Regenerate], [Toxic], [Aura].
Would you believe that the being watching you is, in fact, you?

card.name: The Eye
card.text:
{Summon} Annihilate all units without [Hidden].
If nothing can see you, are you really there?

card.name: Mind Meld
card.text:
Deal 1 damage. {Kill} Resurrect that unit to your field.
What arose that day wore their name.

card.name: Boris the Breaker
card.text:
{Kill} Return all enemy units with a lower Quanta cost than the killed unit to their controller's hand.
"I will break you."

card.name: Second Rider
card.text:
{Summon} Gains +2/0 for each other Second Rider summoned this game. {Death} Shuffle this card into your deck.
Clickity clack, the rider is back.

card.name: Secret Martial Technique
card.text:
When a friendly unit attacks, place a counter on it. When a friendly unit defends, you can remove a counter from it: Destroy the attacking unit after battle.
Balance in all things.

card.name: Dream
card.text:
Scry 5. You can add 1 of those cards to your hand, but if you do, return a card from your hand to your deck. Then, shuffle your deck.
Ah, to see the world and forget it...

card.name: Reckless Ascent
card.text:
Exert: Give a unit the following effect... - {Upkeep} This card gains +2/+2. Destroy it if it has 10/10 or more.
Anyone can achieve power. Few can keep it.

card.name: Ancient Sludge
card.text:
This card's toughness bonuses are doubled.
A strange mass upon which a forest grows.

card.name: Garage Sale
card.text:
Give an opponent a card in your hand, and if you do, draw 2 cards.
What a deal!

card.name: The Champ
card.text:
This card's life cannot be reduced below 1 from battle.
The Champ doesn't lose.

card.name: Mildly Annoying Curse
card.text:
Target opponent summons a 1/1 Statue of an Ugly, Grinning Man token.
Well... damn.
card.related: Statue of an Ugly, Grinning Man

card.name: Mutate
card.text:
Give a friendly unit any ability, except [Invulnerable].
Awaken (your potential).

card.name: Mountain That Walks
card.text:
{Kill} Deal 10 damage to the killed unit's Quanta Lord.
Taking the phrase "Force of Nature" to its logical conclusion.

card.name: Big Wac
card.text:
{Damaged} Your Quanta Lord heals by the damage taken.
The culinary culmination.

card.name: Bridge Keeper
card.text:
Your Quanta Lord cannot take damage.
The keeper is not an obstacle. He is the end of the road.

card.name: Over Vortex
card.text:
{Flash} Shuffle a card from your hand into your deck: Deal 2 damage.
We're operating at maximum power.

card.name: Snapstrike
card.text:
Summon a unit from your hand and immediately attack a unit with it. Return it to your hand after battle.
Either you've surprised your enemy, or you've made them paranoid forever - the ultimate technique.

card.name: Mummy of the Curse
card.text:
{Battle} Purge the opposing unit and give it this effect.
The pharaoh rises in search of new servants.

card.name: Chronological Launch
card.text:
Annihilate a unit from your hand. {Echo 3} Summon that unit.
Save the future.

card.name: Magical Craftsman
card.text:
{Upkeep} Scry 1. You can reveal a support scried this way and add it to your hand. You can shuffle your deck afterwards.
Eye of newt, toe of frog, wool of bat...

card.name: Legacy Eraser
card.text:
{Flash} Sacrifice this card: Annihilate a card from a graveyard.
If history makes us who we are, we should be very worried.

card.name: Soul Siphon
card.text:
{Upkeep} Steal 1 life from a Quanta Lord.
At first, they feel nothing. Then, they feel nothing.

card.name: Afterword
card.text:
This turn, you can resurrect units by paying their Quanta cost as well as that much life.
We'll step below, and call for the fallen. They'll ask to speak, and we'll offer our voice.

card.name: Quack
card.text:
Deal 1 damage to all enemies. Shuffle this card into your deck.
EVERY NIGHT. AT 3:00 AM. UNTIL YOU LOVE IT.

card.name: Tiki Tribesman
card.text:
If this card has strength/toughness bonuses, it has +2/+2 and [Swift].
Hu. Ha. Hu. Tiki tiki.

card.name: Nanofission
card.text:
Exert: Give a friendly Construct -1/-1, then summon a 1/1 Drone token.
They've figured out mitosis! Those bastards!

card.name: Starborne City of Kalangue
card.text:
{Summon} Place 3 counters on this card. When you cast a support, deal 1 damage. At the end of your turn, if you didn't cast a support, remove a counter from this card. Destroy it instead if it has none.
The King of Kalamesh sought a city in the sky. His advisors had bigger plans.

card.name: Chronological Pulse
card.text:
Trigger a player's {Upkeep} effects immediately.
Now is as good of a time as any.

card.name: Soul Control
card.text:
Target a unit. When it dies, add it to your hand.
Look at you, so stuck in the moment.

card.name: Metahunter
card.text:
[Swift] {Flash} When battle takes place: steal one ability from a battling unit for that battle.
But what hunts the Metahunter?

card.name: The First Ironclad
card.text:
{Summon} Sacrifice any number of friendly units: Destroy an equal number of cards.
The prototype technological titan. It holds a chilling secret.

card.name: Sacred Tomato
card.text:
{Death} Heal one friendly target for 4 Life.
Lives to be served. I mean. To serve.

card.name: Sea of Acid
card.text:
Deal 1 damage to all enemy units; their S/T and life cannot increase. {Echo} Apply the above effect without the damage.
Mages are feared for their power. Alchemists are feared for their cruelty.

card.name: Culinary Founder
card.text:
If this card has no strength, you can exert and pay 3Q: Sacrifice a friendly unit and gain strength equal to its cost. {Upkeep} Loses 1 strength. Cannot attack Quanta Lords.
In this world, it's eat.

card.name: Temporal Chain
card.text:
Deal 0 damage. {Upkeep} If this card is in your graveyard, you can add it to your hand.
The Warden rarely had prisoners to watch over, and even then, there were no cells in her tower.
